makna_utama: sebuah usaha atau pekerjaan yang direncanakan untuk mencapai tujuan tertentu
makna_tambahan: dapat merujuk pada tindakan memperkirakan atau menampilkan sesuatu di masa depan atau ke permukaan
contoh_kalimat: The team is working on a new project to improve customer service.
He projected confidence during his presentation.
The company is projecting profits for the next quarter.

jenis_kata.makna: proyek; suatu rencana atau usaha besar yang dirancang untuk mencapai tujuan tertentu
jenis_kata.definisi: a planned undertaking, typically one involving research or design
jenis_kata.contoh: She is leading a science project about climate change.

jenis_kata.definisi: to estimate or forecast something based on present data or trends; to display or throw something forward
jenis_kata.contoh: We project a 20% increase in sales this year.

collocations.contoh: He specializes in project management for construction firms.
The city plans to launch a new housing project next year.
We need to meet the project deadline by the end of this month.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan di suku kata pertama, digunakan sebagai kata benda.
Penekanan di suku kata kedua, digunakan sebagai kata kerja.

roots.definisi: dari bahasa Latin, bentuk lampau dari 'proicere' (melemparkan ke depan)

makna_utama: membatasi atau mengendalikan sejauh mana sesuatu dapat dilakukan atau terjadi
makna_tambahan: melarang atau menahan akses terhadap sesuatu
contoh_kalimat: The new law restricts the sale of alcohol to minors.
Access to the building is restricted to authorized personnel only.
They restricted her internet usage during exams.

jenis_kata.definisi: to limit the movement, actions, or amount of someone or something, or to limit something and reduce its size or prevent it from increasing
jenis_kata.contoh: The school restricts the use of cellphones during class hours.

jenis_kata.definisi: limited in extent, number, scope, or action; exclusive to certain people or conditions
jenis_kata.contoh: The area is restricted to military personnel only.

collocations.contoh: The software restricts access to certain websites.
The injury restricted his movement for several weeks.
Only employees are allowed in the restricted area.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada suku kata kedua, umum digunakan sebagai kata kerja.

roots.definisi: dari bahasa Latin, berarti menarik kembali atau menahan

suffix.makna: berhubungan dengan tindakan atau efek dari menahan

makna_tambahan: menunjukkan bahwa informasi tambahan sedang diberikan dan memperkuat pernyataan sebelumnya
contoh_kalimat: The report is well-written. Furthermore, it provides useful insights.
She is a talented singer. Furthermore, she plays several instruments.
The policy is ineffective. Furthermore, it increases administrative burden.

jenis_kata.definisi: used to add information or emphasize what is being said
jenis_kata.contoh: The proposal is expensive. Furthermore, it is impractical.

collocations.contoh: Furthermore, it should be noted that the project is behind schedule.
Furthermore, we must ensure that the data is accurate.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Pengucapan standar dalam bahasa Inggris dengan tekanan di suku kata pertama 'FUR'.

roots.definisi: gabungan dari 'further' yang berarti lebih jauh dan 'more' yang berarti lebih

makna_utama: menyesuaikan; mengubah sesuatu agar lebih tepat, sesuai, atau efektif
makna_tambahan: beradaptasi terhadap situasi atau kondisi baru
contoh_kalimat: She adjusted the mirror so she could see the road behind her.
He quickly adjusted to the new working environment.
The volume needs to be adjusted to avoid distortion.

jenis_kata.definisi: a small change made to achieve a desired fit, appearance, or result
jenis_kata.contoh: The adjustment to the chair made it more comfortable.

jenis_kata.definisi: to change something slightly to make it more suitable, effective, or comfortable
jenis_kata.contoh: You should adjust the seat before driving.

jenis_kata.definisi: capable of being changed to suit particular needs
jenis_kata.contoh: This office chair has an adjustable height.

collocations.contoh: You can adjust the settings in the control panel.
It takes time to adjust to change.
Children need time to adjust their behavior in a new school.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada suku kata kedua; umum digunakan sebagai kata kerja.

roots.definisi: berasal dari bahasa Latin, artinya membuat sesuatu menjadi sesuai atau tepat

makna_tambahan: menunjukkan kontras antara dua hal, di mana satu hal terjadi walaupun ada hal lain yang berlawanan
contoh_kalimat: Despite the rain, the match continued.
She managed to smile despite the pain.
Despite his lack of experience, he got the job.

jenis_kata.definisi: contempt; disdain (penggunaan lama atau kuno)
jenis_kata.contoh: He acted out of pure despite. (Archaic usage)

collocations.contoh: Despite the fact that he was tired, he kept working.
They completed the project despite difficulties.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada suku kata kedua; digunakan sebagai preposisi untuk menyatakan kontras.

roots.definisi: berasal dari Old French *despit*, berarti penghinaan atau rasa tidak hormat, lalu berkembang menjadi bentuk preposisi modern

suffix.makna: berhubungan dengan pandangan atau penghinaan (akar Latin)

makna_utama: kontras; perbedaan mencolok antara dua hal
makna_tambahan: menunjukkan perbedaan yang jelas ketika dua hal dibandingkan secara berdampingan
contoh_kalimat: The contrast between the two paintings is striking.
Her bright dress was in sharp contrast to the dull colors of the room.
You can contrast the styles of the two authors.

jenis_kata.definisi: the state of being strikingly different from something else in close association
jenis_kata.contoh: There is a stark contrast between rural and urban lifestyles.

jenis_kata.definisi: to compare two things in order to show the differences between them
jenis_kata.contoh: If you contrast this book with her previous one, you’ll see how her writing has improved.

jenis_kata.definisi: markedly different in comparison
jenis_kata.contoh: They wore shirts of contrasting colors.

collocations.contoh: There is a sharp contrast between their opinions.
In contrast to his brother, he is very outgoing.
This design relies on strong color contrast to grab attention.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada suku kata pertama ketika digunakan sebagai kata benda.
Penekanan pada suku kata kedua ketika digunakan sebagai kata kerja.

roots.definisi: berasal dari Latin *contrastare* yang berarti 'berdiri melawan', menandakan perbedaan atau oposisi

makna_utama: teori; penjelasan sistematis tentang suatu fenomena berdasarkan pengamatan, eksperimen, dan penalaran logis
makna_tambahan: gagasan atau pendapat yang belum dibuktikan secara pasti
contoh_kalimat: Einstein's theory of relativity revolutionized physics.
The theory explains how market forces interact.
In theory, the plan should work perfectly.

jenis_kata.definisi: a system of ideas intended to explain something, especially one based on general principles independent of the thing to be explained
jenis_kata.contoh: Darwin's theory of evolution is widely accepted in the scientific community.

jenis_kata.definisi: concerned with or involving the theory of a subject or area of study rather than its practical application
jenis_kata.contoh: This is just a theoretical model, not tested in practice.

jenis_kata.definisi: in theory rather than in practice
jenis_kata.contoh: Theoretically, this method should be faster.

collocations.contoh: A scientific theory must be supported by empirical evidence.
In theory, this law will reduce pollution.
Keynesian economic theory emphasizes government intervention.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Kata benda; penekanan pada suku kata pertama

roots.definisi: berasal dari bahasa Yunani *theoria*, yang berarti 'melihat' atau 'mengamati', dan berkembang menjadi 'pemahaman yang diperoleh dari pengamatan'

suffix.makna: membentuk kata benda dari akar kata

makna_utama: memodifikasi; mengubah sebagian untuk memperbaiki atau menyesuaikan
makna_tambahan: menyesuaikan sesuatu agar lebih sesuai dengan kebutuhan, situasi, atau kondisi tertentu
contoh_kalimat: You can modify the settings to suit your preferences.
The program was modified to run on older computers.
He modified his tone when he saw she was upset.

jenis_kata.definisi: a small change or adjustment made to something to improve it or make it more suitable
jenis_kata.contoh: The software needs a minor modification before release.

jenis_kata.definisi: to change something slightly in order to improve it, make it more acceptable, or make it fit a new purpose
jenis_kata.contoh: They modified the design to reduce production costs.

jenis_kata.definisi: having been changed slightly, especially to improve or make more suitable
jenis_kata.contoh: Genetically modified crops are widely used.

jenis_kata.definisi: in a way that can be modified
jenis_kata.contoh: The rule is modifiably flexible depending on context. (rare usage)

collocations.contoh: Genetically modified foods are subject to strict regulations.
You only need to slightly modify the paragraph to make it clearer.
The therapy helps patients modify their behavior patterns.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada suku kata pertama; kata kerja transitif

roots.definisi: berasal dari bahasa Latin *modificare*, dari *modus* (ukuran, cara) dan *facere* (membuat)

makna_utama: menyelidiki; mencari fakta atau informasi secara sistematis
makna_tambahan: mempelajari sesuatu secara mendalam untuk memahami atau menemukan kebenaran
contoh_kalimat: The police are investigating the cause of the accident.
We need to investigate the issue further before making a decision.
Scientists are investigating new ways to treat the disease.

jenis_kata.definisi: the act or process of examining a matter carefully to discover the truth
jenis_kata.contoh: The investigation took several months to complete.

jenis_kata.definisi: to carry out a systematic or formal inquiry to discover and examine the facts of something
jenis_kata.contoh: The committee was formed to investigate the allegations.

jenis_kata.definisi: relating to or designed to find out information
jenis_kata.contoh: She works as an investigative journalist.

jenis_kata.definisi: in a manner involving investigation
jenis_kata.contoh: The issue was investigatively analyzed. (rare usage)

collocations.contoh: The matter needs to be investigated thoroughly before any action is taken.
Detectives were called to investigate the crime.
The article is a fine piece of investigative journalism.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada subu kata kedua; digunakan sebagai kata kerja (verb)

roots.definisi: berasal dari bahasa Latin *investigare* yang berarti 'melacak jejak', dari *in-* (ke dalam) + *vestigare* (melacak, mencari jejak)

makna_utama: menekankan; memberi tekanan atau perhatian khusus pada sesuatu
makna_tambahan: menyoroti sesuatu agar terlihat penting atau mencolok
contoh_kalimat: She emphasized the importance of punctuality.
The teacher emphasized that homework must be submitted on time.
The report emphasizes the need for better infrastructure.

jenis_kata.definisi: special importance or significance placed on something
jenis_kata.contoh: The emphasis was on quality, not quantity.

jenis_kata.definisi: to give special importance or attention to something in speaking or writing
jenis_kata.contoh: He emphasized that we should not take shortcuts.

jenis_kata.definisi: showing or giving emphasis; expressing something clearly and forcibly
jenis_kata.contoh: She was emphatic in denying the allegations.

jenis_kata.definisi: in a forceful way; without doubt
jenis_kata.contoh: He emphatically rejected the proposal.

collocations.contoh: They emphasize the importance of education.
He raised his voice to emphasize the point.
The minister strongly emphasized the need for reform.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Penekanan pada suku kata pertama; digunakan sebagai kata kerja (verb)

roots.definisi: berasal dari bahasa Yunani *emphainein* yang berarti ‘menunjukkan’ atau ‘menyatakan dengan jelas’

makna_utama: informasi yang dikumpulkan dan diorganisir untuk dianalisis atau digunakan dalam pengambilan keputusan
makna_tambahan: serangkaian fakta atau informasi yang biasanya disimpan dalam bentuk angka, teks, atau lainnya yang digunakan dalam analisis atau perhitungan
contoh_kalimat: The data shows a significant increase in sales over the last quarter.
We need to analyze the data before making any conclusions.
The researcher collected data from over 500 participants.

jenis_kata.definisi: fakta atau informasi yang dikumpulkan, biasanya dalam bentuk angka, teks, atau gambar, yang digunakan untuk analisis atau membuat keputusan
jenis_kata.contoh: The data collected from the survey is crucial for the research.

jenis_kata.definisi: mengandalkan atau menggunakan data untuk membuat keputusan atau merancang strategi
jenis_kata.contoh: The company uses data-driven approaches to improve its marketing strategies.

collocations.contoh: The survey was conducted to collect data on customer preferences.
We will analyze the data to understand the trends in the market.
Companies are using big data to predict consumer behavior.

pengucapan.penjelasan: Pengucapan dapat bervariasi antara /ˈdeɪtə/ dan /ˈdætə/, tergantung pada aksen atau preferensi lokal.

roots.definisi: berasal dari bahasa Latin *datum*, yang berarti ‘sesuatu yang diberikan’, bentuk jamak dari *data*
